title: The Gift Stones
description: What if there is more to life than meets the eye... As a college student, Kevin thinks he has life figured out. Then one night he meets Audrey and discovers that she is not what she appears - and life is not what he had assumed it to be... Each book in the Sky Lands series is a standalone. The books can be read in any order. Recommended for ages 16+ due to language and scenes of violence.
author: T.L. Rese
